channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Istituto Italiano Di Tecnologia on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: From Biased to Unbiased Dynamics: An Infinitesimal Generator Approach
item.description: Learn unbiased molecular dynamics from limited biased data using a novel infinitesimal generator approach; accurately estimating eigenfunctions and eigenvalues even with suboptimal biasing.

item.title: Generalization of Hamiltonian algorithms
item.description: New, tighter generalization bounds are derived for a class of stochastic learning algorithms that generate absolutely continuous probability distributions; enhancing our understanding of their perform…

item.title: Operator World Models for Reinforcement Learning
item.description: POWR: a novel RL algorithm using operator world models and policy mirror descent achieves global convergence with improved sample efficiency.
